parameter.value:
<script type="text/javascript">
  (function () {
    var articleString = "";
    var purchaseProducts = {{Purchase Products}};
    if (typeof purchaseProducts !== "undefined") {
      for (var i=0; i < purchaseProducts.length; i++) {       
        articleString += "&aid_" + (i+1) + "=" + purchaseProducts[i].id
          + "&name_" + (i+1) + "=" + purchaseProducts[i].name
          + "&cnt_" + (i+1) + "=" + purchaseProducts[i].quantity
          + "&val_" + (i+1) + "=" + purchaseProducts[i].price;
      }
    }
  
    var link = "https://billiger.de/sale?shop_id={{Billiger Shop ID}}&oid={{Purchase ID}}" + articleString;

    var i = document.createElement('img');
    i.src = encodeURI(link);
    i.width = 1;
    i.height = 1;
    i.border = 0;
    i.alt = "";

    document.body.appendChild(i);
  })();
</script>
